# bar_nano_no_boom
Removes explosions from construction turrets (nanos)

Paste this into Tweak Units in Cheats:



What is does:
```lua
{
  armnanotc = { explodeas = "blank" },
  armnanotcplat = { explodeas = "blank" },
  armnanotct2 = { explodeas = "blank" },
  armnanotc2plat = { explodeas = "blank" },
  cornanotc = { explodeas = "blank" },
  cornanotcplat = { explodeas = "blank" },
  cornanotct2 = { explodeas = "blank" },
  cornanotc2plat = { explodeas = "blank" },
  legnanotc = { explodeas = "blank" },
  legnanotcplat = { explodeas = "blank" },
  legnanotct2 = { explodeas = "blank" },
  legnanotct2plat = { explodeas = "blank" }
}
```
Tweaking guide: https://gist.github.com/badosu/f2617db52e7486a7769366642d354a01
